query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Data Management Plan (DMP)
result.description: Preliminary Data Management Plan (DMP). The plan, in accordance with GDPR and other relevant regulations, will include protocols for the management of personal data during the demonstrations to be conducted, will describe the entire data management cycle, which consists of data collection, storage, analysis, sharing and deletion.
